title: Occupy Galle Face protest enters 5th day
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); It’s the 5th day of the protest that is being held opposite the President’s Office by people who have come from all over the country for one purpose.
The group spent the night opposite the President’s Office at Galle Face Green at what now know as the GotaGoGama.
Many volunteers were seen supporting the protesters by providing them with food, medicine, and sanitation facilities.
Severe shortage of 5 life-saving drugs, 200 other essential medicine: GMOA
